scripts.minify: echo build/**/*.js | xargs -n1 sh -c 'terser --output build/${1#build/} --compress --mangle -- $1' argv0
scripts.minify2: bash -c "for f in build/*.js; do terser $f --output $f --compress --mangle; done"

name: fs-orm
description: ORM that works with JSON and FS
author: Wijnand Karsens
